nodes.text: The warrior caste was a caste of Geonosians dedicated to warfare. Members of the caste were known as Geonosian warriors, Geonosian soldier drones, or simply Geonosian soldiers. Geonosian soldiers were the only type of Geonosian drone that had functional wings. They possessed tough exoskeletons that gave them protection from injury.
One type of warrior was the Geonosian royal guard, who would serve as bodyguards for an important officials.
